title: Family safety app Life360 adds Tile’s lost-item trackers, years after its acquisition
summary: Over three and a half years after family locator app Life360 acquired lost item tracker Tile for $205 million, the two services are finally fully integrated. On Wednesday, Life360 announced that the item-finding capabilities of Tile, a competitor to Apple’s AirTag and other Bluetooth-based trackers, are now available from inside its main app. The update […]

title: Rillet raises $25M from Sequoia to automate general ledger systems using AI
summary: Rillet directly pulls data from their customers' banks and platforms to generate financial statements, including the balance sheet and income statement.
